description: After a new curry recipe? Try this tasty tomato-based tikka curry with hard-boiled eggs. Serve with naan bread and beans for an easy weeknight dinner.
keywords: Curry,Seafood free,Egg,Weeknight dinner,Budget,Summer,Rice,Quick & easy lunch,Autumn,Tomato,Apr 2021,Peanut free
name: Creamy Tikka Egg Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely grated
8 free range eggs, soft-boiled, peeled, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add capsicum, onion, garlic and ginger, then cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until light golden. Stir in curry and tomato pastes, then cook for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add stock, tomatoes and cream, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes or until sauce has thickened slightly.
Stir eggs into curry mixture, then simmer for 4 minutes. Top curry with beans and coriander, then serve with naan, rice and lemon.
